Class EnquiryController

java.lang.Object
controller.abstracts.ABaseController
controller.EnquiryController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnquiryController
public class EnquiryController extends ABaseController implements IEnquiryController
Controller for managing enquiries in the BTO Management System. Responsible for handling all enquiry-related operations including: - Creating new enquiries - Updating existing enquiries - Deleting enquiries - Responding to enquiries - Retrieving enquiries by various criteria Integrates with data managers to persist and retrieve enquiry information.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Method Details

    • createEnquiry

      public Enquiry createEnquiry(Applicant applicant, String projectName, String enquiryText)
      Creates a new enquiry for an applicant. Validates input, generates a unique enquiry ID, and associates the enquiry with the applicant and optionally a project.
      Specified by:
      createEnquiry in interface IEnquiryController
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant creating the enquiry
      projectName - Optional project name related to the enquiry
      enquiryText - The text content of the enquiry
      Returns:
      The created Enquiry object, or null if creation fails

    • updateEnquiry

      public boolean updateEnquiry(String enquiryId, String newEnquiryText, Applicant applicant)
      Updates an existing enquiry's text. Allows an applicant to modify their own enquiry.
      Specified by:
      updateEnquiry in interface IEnquiryController
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - Unique identifier of the enquiry
      newEnquiryText - Updated text for the enquiry
      applicant - The applicant modifying the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise
